meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joan Kurland Steve Kravitz Lennie Edwards Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #787.

div.div: Final Jeopardy! logo flashes on the game board's monitors instead of the show's logo.

td.p: Joan Kurland, a musician originally from River Edge, New Jersey
Steve Kravitz, a trust and estate attorney from West Palm Beach, Florida
Lennie Edwards, a teacher originally from Fort Dix, New Jersey (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,000)

tr.td: SWIMWEAR
CRIME
CELEBRITY SECRETS
PENNSYLVANIA
POETRY
"BACK" IN SPORTS

tr.td: 20TH CENTURY POLITICIANS
He was an undersecretary of Health, Education & Welfare, a governor & vice president
Lennie
Steve
Joan
2nd place: a trip to Safety Harbor Spa & Fitness Center on Tampa Bay + either the Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
New champion: $18,900 + either the Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
3rd place: a White-Westinghouse full-stackable washer & dryer + either the Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
Lennie
Steve
Joan

(including 1 DD),
